title: Augmented Reality (AR)
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: augmented-reality-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20243
	- preferred-term:: Augmented Reality (AR)
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Interactive system that overlays digital content (visual, audio, haptic) onto the physical environment in real time, enabling spatially-registered blended experiences where virtual information enhances physical perception.
	- source:: [[ISO 9241-940]], [[IEEE P2048-3]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:AugmentedReality
	- owl:physicality:: HybridEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:HybridObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InteractionDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[NetworkLayer]], [[ComputeLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: augmented-reality-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Extended Reality (XR)]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Extended Reality (XR)]]
		- is-part-of:: [[Spatial Computing]]
		- has-part:: [[Environmental Sensor]]
		- has-part:: [[AR Display Device]]
		- has-part:: [[Spatial Tracking System]]
		- has-part:: [[Digital Content Overlay]]
		- requires:: [[Device Camera]]
		- requires:: [[Real-Time Rendering]]
		- requires:: [[Spatial Mapping]]
		- requires:: [[Computer Vision]]
		- enables:: [[Contextual Information Overlay]]
		- enables:: [[Spatial Anchoring]]
		- enables:: [[Interactive Holograms]]
		- enables:: [[Object Recognition]]
		- binds-to:: [[Digital Content Layer]]
		- binds-to:: [[Physical Environment]]
		- depends-on:: [[Depth Sensing]]
		- depends-on:: [[6DOF Tracking]]
		- depends-on:: [[Environmental Understanding]]
		- depends-on:: [[SLAM]]

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable

ontology.definition: Interactive system that overlays digital content (visual, audio, haptic) onto the physical environment in real time, enabling spatially-registered blended experiences where virtual information enhances physical perception.
